Container.Name: Supermicro IPMI Tool
Container.Overview: Manage IPMI compatible Supermicro motherboards with the IPMICFG utility. Provides web-based interface for local and remote BMC management with automatic IPMICFG installation.
Container.Author: ShunHax
Container.Description: Comprehensive Unraid plugin for managing Supermicro motherboards with IPMI support using the IPMICFG utility. Features include power management, sensor monitoring, user management, and event logging with automatic IPMICFG installation.
